mapper.insert: insert ignore into pay_order (seckill_id, user_phone, state, create_time) values (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone}, 0, #{nowTime})
mapper.select: select so.seckill_id, so.user_phone, so.create_time, so.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.inventory "seckill.inventory", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" from pay_order so inner join seckill s on so.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where so.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and so.user_phone=#{userPhone}
